definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
audiobook/recording of a person reading the text of a book

sentences.english: They were very different from her children's stories. They were about love, power, and unhappiness.
sentences.chinese: 与她的儿童读物非常不同，是有关爱，权力和郁闷的。

sentences.english: Here dwells the villain of English children's stories—the red fox.
sentences.chinese: 英国儿童读物中出现的大坏蛋红狐狸就住在这里。

sentences.english: They decided to publish a new series of reading materials for students of English.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定出版一套新的英语学习读物。

sentences.english: I like to plug in an audiobook while I´m on the bus or walking somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在公交车或步行去某地的时候听有声读物。

sentences.english: This bookshop sells books for children.
sentences.chinese: 这家书店出售少儿读物。

sentences.english: Activity site also distributed ten thousand copies of popular science books and promotional materials.
sentences.chinese: 活动现场还发放了近万份科普读物和宣传材料。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the advice on extracurricular reading materials is brought up in excursus.
sentences.chinese: 同时在附录部分还提出了“关于课外读物建议”。

sentences.english: Scores of books have followed, selling millions of copies.
sentences.chinese: 海量的读物陆续出版，热卖多达上百万册。

sentences.english: Her prizewinning novel is a good read.
sentences.chinese: 她的获奖小说是部卓越的读物。

sentences.english: There are a larger packet of readings that's available as a course pack at Tyco's.
sentences.chinese: 大量的读物作为教材集，你可以在泰科，那里找到。

sentences.english: Is it a popular science reading?
Buy classic new books at discount rates.
sentences.chinese: 以会员价购买经典进口全英文读物。

sentences.english: The things we read are like food to our brain.
sentences.chinese: 书籍之类的读物对我们头脑来说就象是食物。

sentences.english: E-audiobooks can also help with learning foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 电子有声读物还可有助于学习外语。

sentences.english: An audiobook is a recording of a book being read aloud.
sentences.chinese: 有声读物以声音来读书。

sentences.english: Donate your old books or volunteer to purchase new books on a child's summer reading list.
sentences.chinese: 捐赠旧图书或自愿购买儿童读物列表上的新书。

definition: books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
a series of books/a collection of books
reference book consisting of material quoted from many sources, arranged by category (about 600 of which were compiled between the 3rd and 18th centuries in China)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
